item.title: GlobalFoundries 首席执行官称客户要求本地芯片供应
item.description: GlobalFoundries Inc.首席执行官蒂姆-布林（Tim Breen）说，这家总部位于美国的公司在德国的扩张计划旨在满足客户日益增长的需求，客户希望保证他们的半导体供应独立于中国大陆和台湾。【原文：GlobalFoundries Inc. Chief Executive Officer Tim Breen said that the US-based company’s expansion plans in Germany are aimed at meeting increasing demands from clients, who want assurances that their supply of semiconductors is independent from China and Taiwan.】

item.title: 尽管美国证券交易委员会（SEC）关闭，新加密货币交易所交易基金仍在拥挤的人群中推出
item.description: 本周，一系列专注于小型加密货币的交易所交易基金将在华尔街首次亮相，发行商将在政府持续停摆的情况下继续上市。【原文：A slew of exchange-traded funds focused on smaller cryptocurrencies are making their Wall Street debut this week, with issuers going ahead with the listings amid the ongoing government shutdown.】

item.title: 美国消费者信心因经济和就业市场前景而下滑
item.description: 由于对经济和劳动力市场前景的看法趋于暗淡，10月份美国消费者信心连续第三个月下降。【原文：US consumer confidence fell in October for a third straight month on dimmer views about the outlook for the economy and labor market.】

item.title: Blackstone 与沙特人工智能公司 Humain 签订 30 亿美元数据中心交易协议
item.description: 私募股权投资巨头 Blackstone Inc. 正与沙特阿拉伯新成立的人工智能公司 Humain 合作，在沙特阿拉伯王国建设数据中心，初期投资约 30 亿美元。【原文：Private equity giant Blackstone Inc. is partnering with Saudi Arabia’s new artificial intelligence company, Humain, to build data centers in the kingdom with an initial investment of about $3 billion.】

item.title: 苹果公司成为历史上第三只市值突破 4 万亿美元的股票
item.description: 苹果公司股价上涨 0.4%，市值达到 4 万亿美元，使这家 iPhone 制造商成为历史上第三家达到这一里程碑的上市公司。【原文：Apple Inc. shares rose as much 0.4% to hit $4 trillion in market value, making the iPhone maker only the third public company in history to reach the milestone.】

item.title: 中国以大豆为支点限制了美国贸易新政的收益
item.description: 当美国和中国在 2020 年解决了之前的贸易战时，美国大豆生产商的出口量激增到接近创纪录的水平。这一次，任何协议的回报都可能小得多。【原文：When the US and China settled their earlier trade war in 2020, American soybean producers saw their exports surge to near record levels. This time around, any deal is likely to yield far smaller rewards.】

item.title: S&P 500 指数上涨，交易员等待财报展示和降息消息
item.description: 周二，美国股市继续上扬，因为华尔街正在等待所谓的 "七大公司 "中的一些公司本周公布财报，美联储也开始了为期两天的会议。【原文：US stocks extended their advance Tuesday as Wall Street awaited a roll out of financial results from some of the so-called Magnificent Seven companies this week and the Federal Reserve commenced its two-day meeting.】

item.title: 俄罗斯原油流量走低，但还不能归咎于制裁
item.description:
波罗的海主要港口的大风可能阻碍了上周的装货作业

。【原文：

High winds at key Baltic port likely hampered loading operations last week

】

item.title: OpenAI 敲定营利计划，微软获 27% 股份
item.description: 微软公司（Microsoft Corp.）和 OpenAI 在长期谈判的合作伙伴关系中敲定了一项新协议，为两家公司的投资者消除了一层不确定性，并为 ChatGPT 制造商重组为营利性企业铺平了道路。【原文：Microsoft Corp. and OpenAI finalized a new agreement in a long-negotiated partnership, removing a layer of uncertainty for both companies’ investors and paving the way for the ChatGPT maker to restructure as a for-profit business.】

item.title: ERG 正在酝酿对巴西巴明铁矿石项目的收购要约
item.description: 欧亚资源集团正在与三家对其巴西铁矿石项目感兴趣的投资者进行谈判。【原文：Eurasian Resources Group is in talks with three different investors interested in its Brazilian iron ore project Bahia Mineração.】

item.title: 国会如何解决美国农民工短缺问题
item.description:
由于特朗普政府将移民执法作为优先事项，来自农业区的代表们表示，他们需要一个创造性的解决方案来快速解决他们的劳动力问题。【原文：

As the Trump administration prioritizes immigration enforcement, representatives from farming districts say they need a creative solution to their labor problems, and fast.

】

item.title: 美国房价创两年多来最弱涨幅
item.description: 由于购房者在谈判中增加了筹码，且库存增加，8 月份房价涨幅为两年多来最小，连续第七个月放缓。【原文：Home prices gained the least in over two years, slowing for the seventh straight month in August as buyers gained leverage in negotiations and inventory grew.】

item.title: 泰尔支持的芯片初创公司 Substrate 试图打破 ASML 的主导地位
item.description: 美国出现了一家神秘的初创公司，立志挑战半导体行业的两大巨头：ASML Holding NV 和台湾积体电路制造股份有限公司（Taiwan Semiconductor Manufacturing Co.【原文：A secretive American startup has emerged with aspirations to challenge two titans of the semiconductor industry: ASML Holding NV and Taiwan Semiconductor Manufacturing Co.】

item.title: 英国证券监管机构计划让卖空者匿名
item.description: 英国金融行为监管局（Financial Conduct Authority）建议停止公开披露卖空者身份，作为其鼓励市场活动的努力的一部分。【原文：The UK’s Financial Conduct Authority has proposed ending the public disclosure of short seller identities, as part of its attempts to encourage market activity.】

item.title: 黄金回调未能撼动看涨情绪，预计将跌至 5,000 美元
item.description: 过去一周，黄金在大幅反弹后出现了下滑，但这并没有影响人们对其长期前景的乐观情绪，因为各国央行和投资者都发出了持续需求的信号。【原文：Gold’s slump over the past week, following a blistering rally, hasn’t dented the optimism over its longer-term prospects, as central banks and investors signal continued demand.】

item.title: Grubhub 通过与 Instacart 合作促进杂货配送
item.description: Grubhub 正在与 Instacart 合作提供杂货订购服务，帮助其赶上外卖竞争对手 DoorDash 公司和优步科技公司。【原文：Grubhub is partnering with Instacart to offer grocery ordering, helping it catch up with delivery rivals DoorDash Inc. and Uber Technologies Inc.】

item.title: ADP 在暂停向美联储提供数据后推出每周美国薪资报告
item.description: ADP Research 除了发布月度报告外，现在还将每周发布美国薪资数据，以提供对劳动力市场的高频洞察。【原文：ADP Research will now be releasing US payroll data on a weekly basis, in addition to its monthly report, to provide high-frequency insights into the labor market.】

item.title: 阿根廷经济回升，比索显示出 Milei 兴奋的极限
item.description: 阿根廷总统哈维尔-米莱伊在选举中出人意料地获胜，引发了令人震惊的反弹，债券价格创下历史新高，股市也因投资者的回流而暴涨超过 20%。【原文：The rallies unleashed by Argentina President Javier Milei’s surprising electoral win were stunning, with bond prices posting record gains and the stock market skyrocketing over 20% as investors stampeded back in.】

item.title: 预测市场认为特朗普关税案将在最高法院一锤定音
item.description: 特朗普关税案将在最高法院摊牌，赌徒们认为胜负难料【原文：Trump's tariffs are heading for a Supreme Court showdown and bettors see a close call】

item.title: Adobe 首席执行官称股价被低估，市场聚焦芯片
item.description: Adobe Inc.首席执行官尚塔努-纳拉延（Shantanu Narayen）表示，由于华尔街关注芯片和人工智能培训基础设施，他的公司被低估了。【原文：Adobe Inc. Chief Executive Officer Shantanu Narayen said his company is being undervalued as Wall Street focuses on chips and AI training infrastructure.】

item.title: 野村欧洲利率掉期交易主管最新离职
item.description: 野村控股公司（Nomura Holdings Inc.【原文：A senior figure at Nomura Holdings Inc.’s rates-trading unit is leaving, the latest departure from what is one of the most important businesses for Japan’s biggest brokerage.】

item.title: 欧洲太阳能发电激增给电网带来前所未有的压力
item.description: 可再生能源的兴起导致了数以千计的电压超标事件。【原文：The rise of renewables had led to thousands of instances of voltage exceeding allowed limits.】

item.title: 爱尔兰经济近两年来首次出现萎缩
item.description: 在截至 9 月份的三个月中，爱尔兰经济出现萎缩，美国总统唐纳德-特朗普的贸易炮火在这一季度占据了主导地位。【原文：Ireland’s economy contracted in the three months through September, a quarter that was dominated by US President Donald Trump’s trade salvos.】

item.title: PayPal 宣布与 OpenAI 达成交易后上调盈利预期
item.description: 贝宝控股公司（PayPal Holdings Inc.）上调了全年盈利指导，并宣布与 OpenAI 合作，将其数字钱包嵌入 ChatGPT，从而使其股价在纽约早盘交易中飙升。【原文：PayPal Holdings Inc. raised its full-year earnings guidance and announced a tie-up with OpenAI to embed its digital wallet into ChatGPT, sending its shares soaring in early New York trading.】

item.title: 亚马逊人工智能云业务增长放缓可能并非致命缺陷
item.description: 欢迎阅读 Tech In Depth，这是彭博社全球记者关于科技商业的每日时事通讯。今天，马特-戴评估了亚马逊在不断变化的云计算市场中的地位。【原文：Welcome to Tech In Depth, our daily newsletter about the business of tech from Bloomberg’s journalists around the world. Today, Matt Day sizes up Amazon’s place in the changing cloud computing market.】

item.title: 加密货币行业在中期选举前积累 2.63 亿美元战利品
item.description: 刚刚在 2024 年大选中取得成功，加密货币行业又在 2026 年中期选举前提高了消费能力。【原文：Fresh off its success in the 2024 elections, the crypto industry is amping up its spending power ahead of the 2026 midterms.】

item.title: 2026 年值得关注的 24 家初创企业（OpenAI 除外
item.description:
有二十多家公司通过制作振动编码软件、制造机器人和开发无人机，在人工智能领域找到了自己的方向。【原文：

Two dozen companies are finding their way in AI by making vibe-coding software, building robots and developing drones.

】

item.title: 曾警告中美贸易战 "一团糟 "的中国专家看到了新的升级风险
item.description: 斯科特-肯尼迪（Scott Kennedy）警告说，两国之间正在出现的休战可能基础不稳。【原文：Scott Kennedy cautions that the emerging truce between the two nations may rest on a shaky foundation.】

item.title: 高盛和贝莱德签约试用 Circle 的 Arc 区块链
item.description: 稳定币发行商Circle Internet Group Inc.推出了Arc区块链测试版，包括高盛集团（Goldman Sachs Group Inc）、贝莱德（BlackRock）、阿波罗全球管理公司（Apollo Global Management Inc）、Anthropic PBC和洲际交易所（Intercontinental Exchange Inc）在内的多家公司签约试用该技术。【原文：Stablecoin issuer Circle Internet Group Inc. has launched the test version of its Arc blockchain, with companies including Goldman Sachs Group Inc, BlackRock, Apollo Global Management Inc, Anthropic PBC and Intercontinental Exchange Inc signing up to trial the technology.】

item.title: 贝宝与 OpenAI 的 ChatGPT 达成数字钱包协议
item.description: 贝宝控股公司（PayPal Holdings Inc.【原文：PayPal Holdings Inc. shares soared after it reached a deal with OpenAI to embed its digital wallet inside the firm’s ChatGPT product.】
